Interface Scanner

ScannerImpl
public interface Scanner
extends ScannerBase, java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<Key,Value>>

Walk a table over a given range.

Method Detail

setTimeOut

void setTimeOut(int timeOut)
When failure occurs, the scanner automatically retries. This setting determines how long a scanner will retry. By default a scanner will retry forever.

Parameters:
timeOut - in milliseconds

getTimeOut

int getTimeOut()

setRange

void setRange(Range range)

setBatchSize

void setBatchSize(int size)
Parameters:
size - the number of Keys/Value pairs to fetch per call to Cloudbase

iterator

java.util.Iterator<java.util.Map.Entry<Key,Value>> iterator()
Returns an iterator over a cloudbase table. This iterator uses the options that are currently set on the scanner for its lifetime. So setting options on a Scanner object will have no effect on existing iterators.

Specified by:
iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<Key,Value>>
